name: Trickster Trove
storyline:
Feel the fear and adrenaline in the deadly dungeons in search of treasures. Create impenetrable catacombs, protecting loot from other players. Test your skills and strategies in a world where every decision can be your last. One life – one chance!
Build and defend your own dungeon system and go raiding other players’ catacombs, all for the sake of the treasures. Create a unique treasury and devise ways to keep your loot safe from other tricksters. Assemble underground labyrinths from modules on the architect’s table and position your traps and monsters there creating a system of obstacles for uninvited guests.
For every trickster you destroy and stop, earn a reward that you can spend on character equipment and better protection inside the modules. You can also set up your dungeon to suit your taste using decorations. Enter dungeons created by other players, filled with traps and gold. You have one attempt, one life, and many hidden dangers along the way. Take the necessary equipment and find your way to the main treasury, collecting valuables along the way. Gather a team of up to 4 friends in co-op mode and test your strength together in the dark and eerie dungeons.
Mysterious and cunning robbers, charismatic scoundrels, and brilliant deceivers: tricksters always walk the line between life and death, playing with fate and testing their luck. With the unique ability to inhabit the bodies of executed tricksters, you can feel alive again. Take a deep breath and risk sneaking into the most dangerous dungeons to get tempting and generous rewards. Grab equipment and supplies that will help you reach your goal and accomplish the life mission of your new body.
summary: Feel the fear and adrenaline in the deadly dungeons in search of treasures. Create impenetrable catacombs, protecting loot from other players. Test your skills and strategies in a world where every decision can be your last. One life - one chance!
